original_text: They were enrolled with all their little children, their wives, their sons, and their daughters, the whole assembly, for they were faithful in keeping themselves holy.
korean_text: 또 그 족보에 기록된 온 회중의 어린 아이들 아내들 자녀들에게 나눠 주었으니 이 회중은 성결하고 충실히 그 직분을 다하는 자며

sentences.original_text: They were enrolled with all their little children,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기 어린 아이들과 함께 등록되었고,

sentences.original_text: their wives, their sons, and their daughters,
for they were faithful in keeping themselves holy.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 자신을 거룩하게 지키는 데 신실하였기 때문입니다.
